trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for several derived classes that represents the return value from a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder basisklassen for flere avledede klasser som representerer returverdien fra en treffprosent test.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult> classes derive from HitTestResult.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult>klasser som er avledet fra HitTestResult.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RayHitTestResult> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestResult>

trans-unit.source: Gets the visual object that was hit.
trans-unit.target: Henter visual objektet som ble oppdaget.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> is the type rather than <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> so that hit testing can bridge 2D and 3D trees through a viewport.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>er av typen snarere enn <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>slik at treffprosent testing kan tette 2D- og 3D tr√¶r via en VISNINGSPORT.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual></xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> value that represents the visual object that was hit.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> verdi som Representer visual objektet som ble oppdaget.
